maats: Chinese Character Encoding Standards
zero_shot: Character encoding.
single_agent: Information dissemination and Chinese character encoding.

maats: This document applies to technical products with the function of information processing and exchange of Chinese and other language graphic characters, including but not limited to software products such as input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation, text-to-speech, text transcription, and intelligent writing software, as well as hardware products such as computers, communication terminal devices, e-book readers, and learning devices.

maats: The double-byte part includes all the graphic characters in GB/T 2312-1980, the CJK Unified Ideographs in GB/T 13000, as well as some additional graphic characters.
zero_shot: The double-byte part includes all the graphic characters in GB/T 2312-1980 and the CJK Unified Ideographs in GB/T 13000, as well as some additional graphic characters.

maats: The graphic, code position, and function of the ideographic character descriptors must adhere to the requirements set forth in Appendix B.
zero_shot: The graphic, code position, and function of the ideographic character descriptor should comply with the provisions of Appendix B.
single_agent: Among them, the graphic, code position, and function of the ideographic character descriptor must comply with the provisions of Appendix B.

maats: Les caractères chinois ayant des formes de caractères abstraites uniques se voient attribuer des positions de code individuelles. Les caractères chinois ayant les mêmes formes de caractères abstraites mais des origines différentes se voient attribuer des positions de code partagées.
zero_shot: The Chinese characters with unique abstract character forms are assigned individual code positions. Chinese characters with the same abstract character forms but different origins are assigned shared code positions.
single_agent: Chinese characters with unique abstract forms are assigned their own unique character encodings, while characters with the same abstract form but different origins are assigned shared character encodings.

maats: Le fichier quatre octets comprend 66 caractères Han unifiés CJK (9FA6 - 9FEF, à l'exclusion de 8 caractères de 9FB4 à 9FBB) en dehors des caractères deux octets ci-dessus dans GB/T 13000, ainsi que les Extensions des caractères Han unifiés CJK A, B, C, D, E et F, et quelques caractères de langues minoritaires déjà codés dans GB/T 13000.
zero_shot: The four-byte section includes 66 CJK unified Han characters (9FA6 - 9FEF, excluding 8 characters from 9FB4 to 9FBB) outside the above two-byte characters in GB/T 13000, CJK Unified Han Extensions A, CJK Unified Han Extensions B, CJK Unified Han Extensions C, CJK Unified Han Extensions D, CJK Unified Han Extensions E, CJK Unified Han Extensions F, and a few minority language characters that have already been encoded in GB/T 13000.
single_agent: The four-byte section includes 66 CJK unified Han characters (9FA6 - 9FEF, excluding 8 characters from 9FB4 to 9FBB) outside the above two-byte characters in GB/T 13000, as well as CJK Unified Han Extensions A, B, C, D, and F, and a few minority language characters that have already been encoded in GB/T 13000.
